inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 23, "index": 16}, {"type": "warped_fence", "quantity": 21, "index": 17}, {"type": "dark_oak_pressure_plate", "quantity": 32, "index": 24}, {"type": "white_terracotta", "quantity": 15, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft a dark_oak_sign, I first need to craft dark_oak_planks, which require 1 dark_oak_log in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move 1 dark_oak_log from slot 12 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
